Related repos

  • Open-source lossless music player for audiophiles
  • cross-platform music player with playlists, synced lyrics, and material design
  • Generates playlists through sonic analysis of local audio files
  • Embeddable dynamic scripting for Rust projects
  • Offline music player for macOS with bit-perfect playback
